name: Patagonia Atom Pack 18L - Unisex
description: Consider this your default pack for weekend wanders, day trips, light hikes and far away travels. Sleek and minimalist, the Atom hits the perfect balance of organization and comfort. Stash your lunch, camera, light jacket and compact laptop and get moving.Main fabric is durable 630-denier nylon with 50% recycled content and a DWR finish to shed light rain.Padded shoulder straps have airflow-mesh backing for breezy comfort.Top-mounted, reinforced haul handle.Internal sleeve holds most tablets or 13in. laptops.Zippered front stash pocket holds quick-access items.
